inclusion.criterion: Dr. Jamal Mourad or Dr. Nichole Mahnert will be performing hysterectomy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Adverse events/reactions will be reported to the UA IRB
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: To assure their study-related costs are paid for, all study-related procedures/tests must be conducted at a Banner Health facility
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is eligible for the trial based on the inclusion criteria. However, there are some exclusion criteria that may trigger ineligibility, such as adverse events/reactions being reported to the UA IRB and study-related costs not being paid for at a Banner Health facility.
